content.detailedDescription:
Approx 9 pm july 4th, 2013, i was driving and witnessed a white diamond shaped object in sky with a circular orange/red light in center hovering directly above road, maybe a few miles away, and maybe a thousand feet or more up,but very clear. so fast it moved, i cannot explain, it moved vertically, down, then up, then to the left.  then straight down. disappearing into horizon. it was so fast, like a laser pen would move, but it stopped on a dime. then moved again, stopped in a micro second. to go so fast and stop so quickly, i knew i was witnessing something extremely unusual. and to move perfectly vertically was very strange. also the shape was very strange. i knew what i saw was a ufo. i was very very nervous, as i was almost home. i got out of the car, looking in the same direction, it was gone. i told my boyfriend. i went again back outside, feeling very uneasy. gone. the rest of the summer i felt uncomfortable going outside at night, as i realized the event was somewhat traumatizing at a deep level. it was most definitely a ufo. thankyou.
d.
content.summary: Witnessed a diamond shaped object with a glowing circular light in middle in sky at night. sudden, very sudden and fast, super fast acent in a straight line vertically, up again in another straight line vertical, over and down disappearing over camlachie.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home with my girlfriend from the senior prom.Then we saw the light in the sky, at first i thought it was a radio tower light, but then it moved. we were kind of freaked out a bit, but we stopped the car and got out to look, i took a short video because it looked like it had disappeared, but when i looked at the video later i noticed and wished i had recorded longer , my girlfriend took a photograph of the objects. the objects were a reddish orange and just floated and moved around gracefully with no sound was also hovering, we were scared but not too bad, we got back in the car and headed home to tell my mom what we saw. later on we went to a prom party and a lot of other people had seen the same objects. the next night sunday may 25th, i had seen the same thing but only one this time, with two of my friends and one was a skeptic until then.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reddish orange orb floating and moving around gracefully at times hovering, was about 200ft above us.

content.detailedDescription:
Shopping, brother called at just after 9:00 am to tell me of object hovering. i went outside and saw what looked to me as a star-like sphere which is perfectly motionless, even when lined up with a stationary object, and over a very long period of time.  i pointed it out to several people, all of whom could see it.  i called my dad who lives 20 miles away, and he could also see it. the sun has moved, but the object remains in its position in the sky, staying motionless, despite the movement of the sun.  i went home and took many pictures of the object, and the images seem to reveal multiple objects in the sky not visible with the naked eye.  i went inside just now to load the images from my camera, and now the object is gone.
it disappeared after at least 1.5 hours of motionlessness after first seeing it. i called the tv station, and they said that they have received multiple reports of the same object.
i am feeling fascinated and puzzled by the object.
content.summary: Hovering light more than 1 hour, photos show multiple objects.

content.detailedDescription: I usually walk my dog around midnight. we were standing at the foot of my driveway waiting to see if my dog was ready to retire for the night and i was looking down my street. about half a kilometre away there is a hill behind homes with large trees. it was a very clear night so i was looking at the sky when suddenly i saw an extremely bright light travelling in a straight line above the tree tops. it was travelling at a very high rate of speed, basically as fast as moving your arm from left to right and then it left my view. it was like looking at a very bright led christmas light only it was round and fairly large, probably about a quarter size of a full moon. there was no sound. the brightness was consistent. always bright. but it didn't light up the night sky around it. the only brightness was coming from the object. it certainly wasn't a plane, far too low. doubt if it was a satellite. again far too low. it probably was travelling as fast as a fighter jet would travel. the brantford municipal airport is about 5 miles to the west of where i first saw the object and hamilton international airport is about 30 miles to the east. when i initially saw it, the first thing that came to mind was that i was seeing the headlight of a truck moving along a road because there is a four-lane highway just beyond those the hill/trees. but then i realized, the light would have been facing me, not going from left to right. also, i went out the next night around the same time and never saw a thing so pretty sure you can't see cars or trucks travelling along that highway.
content.summary: Walking dog when i saw am extremely bright light travelling at a high rate of speed from my left to right above the tree tops about half a kilometre down my street.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on a ferry heading from larkspur, ca to san francisco, ca on the way to the sf giants game. we were nearing the bay bridge, in the water between treasure island and the ferry building. i noticed a commercial aircraft flying high overhead, heading south. near that plane i saw what at first appeared to be a smaller plane in the distance, but near the same trajectory of the commercial airline. i thought it seemed a little close. the smaller object appeared to be white in color with a non-descript shape. the commercial plan continued on it's path, and the small object was observed to be higher up and not moving in a direction. i pointed the object out to my wife and she also observed it. at that point, i began to question what it was i was seeing. the object then seemed to be moving very slowly, across the bay (west to east), all the while the ferry was moving south under the bridge and so the precise motion of the object was difficult to determine. however, as we continued to watch the object, it seemed to be extremely high up and more overhead ( i had to crane my neck in order to continue observing it). the object appeared to be shinny, round; a sphere. it was small in size, being so high up. it was not moving position that i could tell, not on a trajectory across the sky. it seemed to be staying directly over the bay. i continued to observe the object for about 15-20 minutes. i tried to take photos of it but it was too far away for our 200mm lens to capture it. the sky was completely clear, bright blue, no clouds, sunshine. the object eventually just seemed to disappear, and i could not find it in the sky.
content.summary: White sphere observed over san francisco bay

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the courtyard at work, stargazing and meditating.  the night sky was crystal clear with a very light breeze.  i was looking up and i saw a sudden flash of light in my mid-peripheral vision.  i attempted to locate the craft.  after a few seconds, i saw the light flashing again.  it rapidly flashed a white light as it moved silently from the east to the west.  i watched as it made it's way to my right.  i could not find a recognizable pattern in the number of flashes or in the lengths of its pauses.  it made a 100-120 degree turn to the right and was now heading ne.  it meandered back to the west again for a few seconds and then turned once again to the ne.   at the point, i lost sight of it and so i went through the building out to the other side, quickly grabbing a coworker with me as a witness.    we exited the building on the north side.  she saw a flash of light and then 3 streaks of light. i could not focus on her side of the sky fast enough to witness this.   the end.  

i enjoy meditating and sky-gazing most every night from the courtyard at work.  i am familiar with the commercial planes and their usual flight path.  i am familiar with satellites and can easily find a half-dozen an hour during that time of morning.  i do not know what this was.  

as a woman who grew up at airports and as a wife of a helicopter crew chief, i can tell you that this was not a plane or a helicopter and it was not a satellite.   other than that, i have no idea what it was.  i would like to believe that it was a real ufo attempting to appease my curiosity.  lol.  

how did i feel?   very calm but happy and grateful and excited.  i
content.summary: Silent aircraft with wildly random flashing lights, traveling west, made right angle turn changed to north heading.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home @11:26pm sunday, may 25,2014 driving ne into monroe, wa. noticed a formation of what looked like red-orange rocket flames with two next to each other parallel to horizon with the third one above the right one of the two below.

no sounds associated, appeared to be way off in distance.

noticed the top one was moving upward, the bottom right one was moving upward after the top one and the left bottom one was then following the second one such that though initially they formed a right angle triangle, they ended up in a straight line following each other. i watched as each one went into the clouds, as i could see them get "fuzzy" as they entered the clouds and as they approached a thinner portion of the clouds they got less fuzzy but continued to get dimmer due to distance.

where would any rockets be coming from that could be seen from my location and since when do rockets get launched in rapid succession? actually, i could more likely believe they would be interceptor missiles or something similar. i am eager to find out if other saw these and what explanations there are.
content.summary: 3 lights looked like rocket flames appearing to go from triangle formation to following each other out of atmosphere 1 after another

content.detailedDescription:
September 3 2013
laughlin, nevada
10:15pm
intersection of bruce woodbury drive and thomas edison drive heading out to metal detect in the river. looking north-east over the riverside casino in the spotlight i noticed two discs moving at incredible rates of speed darting at sharp angles and glimmering in the riverside casino spotlight so i pulled over. they looked very thin and sleek with a reflective surface. i was stunned to watch this but excited. i only had my iphone but i got what pictures i could. went home to get the camcorder and they were gone.
content.summary: Stopped car, watched ufo's dart around, took iphone pics.

content.detailedDescription: I was reclining in my lawn chair on my back patio, when a searchlight caught my eye.  since i live within a couple of miles from an air force base, i didn't think much of it, except that only rarely do i see the base's control tower light.  i moved into a shadowed area of my back, on my lawn, and gazed skyward.  i positioned myself so that i did not have any street lights or house lights that would have obscured my night vision. i waited and watched for the af base control tower light to return, but it never did return.  then i saw the crafts.  they were traveling in a straight line, directly above me, approximately 500 feet from the ground, flying in formation, traveling in a straight north direction.  there were 3 objects, flying in a "v" formation, all objects appeared to be either grayish or gray/white in color.  each craft was shaped like an "x", or more correctly, like a cross.  my best description of these crafts would be something like this:  place 4 petals from a daisy, making a cross, with the base of all petals melting together.  i am estimating that these crafts were traveling in excess of 150 mph, mainly because of the short duration of my sighting.  these crafts were not birds, they made no sound, they did travel in formation, and they were flying faster than any bird or any single engine airplane that i have ever seen.  it appeared to me, that almost immediately after i lost sight of the trio, i saw a small flash of light in the general area that the crafts seemed to be headed.  i was and am completely, stone cold sober, and am not under the influence of any medications.  what i saw was real.
content.summary: 3 cross shaped objects, grayish white in color, flying in formation directly from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: Just witnessed this earlier with longtime friend of 45 yrs. we went out on 12th floor balcony (facing lake erie) for some fresh air and friend noticed a series of about 7? red-orange orbs approaching toward our location which became brighter as they approached. they appeared to come to a rest forming a triangle then began to go in opposite direction and faded as they went away from us.  i was able to grab 2 different sets of binoculars to look at objects which were very impressive looking using binocs.  definitely not a known aircraft.  they were stunning and unbelievable.  we would love to tell someone in person what we witnessed. have a 5 sec video from cell phone but nothing can be sent was taken to late it appears
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Series of red-orange orbs approach then retreat and fade out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Please see short description above   i have many memories from childhood in los angeles, california of having sleep paralysis   recurrent nightmares of an airplane crashing into a tree across the street and also one of recurrent drowning in a creek  i would awaken right before i "died"  many nose bleeds as a child  extreme fear of outdoor red xmas decoration my mother displayed outside of my window at night   my toys floating in the air as a child  visions of myself, at age 5, on a gynecology table being examined by "doctors."  i started masturbation at age 5  i believe i have the alien love bite syndrome (started at age 4) my older brother found on the roof of house in middle of night 2 or 3 times  my son at age 10 complaining "the big beatles are going to get me" my son is in his late 30's now and sleeps with an overhead light shining on his face  i can remote view, see auras, have seen angelic beings of light, shadow people, i have heard loud voices giving me commands, "the spirit of my unborn daughter" came to me and "commanded" that i get pregnant at age 28...I did! my two children "turned off" and stopped loving me at about age 12 (i was a good mother) i have been tested and have uhf waves in my brain and constant ringing in my ears   i am currently wanting to have some regression sessions to be hypnotized to remember more (i live in las vegas, nevada and would appreciate a referral) i see little sparks of blue light fly off people every day  i have astral traveled once   i saw a spirit who "dictated" a little children's story to me in 1988 (he would not leave me alone until i took the words down...Then i published the book) i have always remembered my "home" being a place with vivid colors and rainbows..I have always been homesick and have never felt comfortable here   i have seen my daughter, my deceased pets, and others in their astral bodies, i "download" information from "angeles" when i am working and the advice i get is accurate, loving, and helpful to all concerned  i feel driven to publish a few books this year and have tried to not write for years...But i am awakened in the middle of the night to write down stuff that is coming into my head   i disturb the copying machine at work and put out street lights when i walk under them   i would like to be x rayed to see if i have an implant in my head    i remember a screen memory of a "ladybug" crawling up my nose as a child   many nosebleeds as did my siblings and friend   saw a ship over my home in las vegas, nevada in 1998   do not recall being on a ship but would like to   can you give me the name of a regression therapist here in las vegas, nevada?  call me if you would like more information   also: i received shaktipat (the kundalini) who picked me out of a large group of yoga students at boise state university in the late 1980's. it was an amazing experience  the instructor was very angry and jealous that the yogi picked me (i don't know why i was picked) i had more kundalini experiences after that (spontaneous) one that lasted for one entire week! it was similar to an lsd experience  i had to take psychiatric drugs to get it to stop   i work as a counselor and have been mmpi tested and i am sane and within normal limits of psychiatric health  my son, today, avoids all contact with me and is manic and nervous and becomes angry when ufo subject is mentioned
content.summary: Blue orbs were floating in my bedroom  my boyfriend's body was elevated 6 feet in the air  my son complained a few hours later "the big beatles are getting me" he was 10  i was simply observing all this

content.detailedDescription: On the deck of a house in feasterville pennsylvania saw a giant red orb coming across the night sky, called to two other people, to come and see. we all watched it trail across the sky towards the northwest it was too quick to pull out our phones and get a picture before went behind the trees. it was pretty low in the sky it was sailing across in a straight line, no tail/contrail, and there was absolutely no sound.
content.summary: Big bright red orb sailing across the night silently and quickly

content.detailedDescription: At 10pm may 25th in kewanna indiana as i was  going out to the car i looked up to see a good sized orange light lingering in the air... it started moving slowly so i ran in to get my husband so i had a witness and knew i wasn't  crazy. he came out and it was still there. it started moving fast and changing directions from northwest to north east and went towards a plane and started getting smaller and smaller and itching about 45 seconds after the  orange light started getting smaller, it completely disappeared. i was pretty much in awe. it was not the first time if seen weird things in the sky.... this however is the very first time my husbands witnessed such a thing. i had serious goosebumps.
content.summary: Burnt orange light, fairly big size, went towards airplane, got smaller and disappeared very quickly

content.detailedDescription: I saw two lights from about ten miles away, as i got closer the object was moving very slow so i pulled into a road and got out of my car, as i stood there i managed to take one very bad picture but i heard no sound and as it flew over me i saw it had three lights, one in the front and two in the back with a dim white light to connect all three, their light was pure white and very bright and it flew right over me as clear as day and was bout 100 feet in length and about 600 feet in the air, i watched as it proceeds to fly over the near by football feild without a sound or any flashing lights, i realized that what i saw wasn't from this world and i got back in the car and drove home this whole sighting was around 3-4 minutes in length
content.summary: It flew over me without a sound and very low to the ground

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out side to the balcony of my girlfriend's third story apartment for a cigarette. i first looked in a westerly direction to view any stars that had appeared roughly one hour after sundown. the westerly direction is the back of the apartment building looking over the parking lot which has two lights in order to illuminate the area for the tenants. i then got curious to see if by turning away and placing my back to the parking lot lights if more stars would come into view. knowing that ambient light distorts your ability to see many stars.
when i turned to look east i immediately saw two large glowing orange orbs. one was heading further east as though it was in a flight path. the second seemed to be heading directly northwest towards me. the light became much brighter at this point, like the headlights of an automobile coming towards you at night. i then quickly opened the outer door and called to my girlfriend to come and see this quickly! i immediately went back to my position to watch the two objects. when my girlfriend appeared beside me the closest object had disappeared. the second object i pointed out to her. that glowing object continued in its easterly direction and at about two miles out from our position it descended below the tree line. as that was taking place the closest object reappeared from behind the tree line roughly one quarter mile away and slowly turned ninety degrees back towards the east. at no point did we ever see or notice a change in shape or luminescence. there were no blinking lights like an aircraft would have. such as a helicopter or aero plane. the object emitted no sound at any time. we stood and watched the object until it eventually got roughly two miles away from us and ascended. as it ascended the objected just blinked out. again, the first object disappeared descending below the tree line two miles out. the second object eventually blinked out while ascending roughly two miles out from our location.
this event took place over a fifteen to twenty minute period. a truly unusual and unique experience for the two of us.

                                            sincerely, christopher m. stricker. 05-25-2014
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From a three story rooftop balcony i observed a bright orange, extremely slow moving orb. at first appeared to be coming from the east in a northwest direction and then made a 90* turn back to the east. first orb descended second ascended blinked out.

content.detailedDescription:
I need to get this message out i think they may be friendly but what if they are not? so remember this the small greys are about 3.5-4ft. tall and i think they can somehow jump 12+ ft. straight up possibly grasp any building and also somehow fry outdoor cameras. up close eyes look like very large and the darkest limo tint film on the eyes this message is helpful because just maybe those eyes are vulnerable to something like a high powered or even just a small laser pointer. trust me i looked out the window at one of these about 6 mths. ago then ran from window no harm done. i would like to say it is best to not engage or be stupid. and also this is not my first sighting they all the sudden showed up last year and they are very very close when they do.

 i did not leave my name. hows this! i really don't mind if you all say ha ha that guy is just a hoaxer making up a ufo story on mufon then laughing about it later. yes that is exactly what i want you to think.

thank you cool mufon people and remember we are not alone.
content.summary: I looked into its very large almond shaped limo tinted eyes

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on porch with partner
2. looked out of corner of eye, felt something and saw motion.
3. plane
4. there were three bright red objects in the sky, triangle formation that appeared to be moving in a circular motion.  the distance between the lights was great.   observation in this formation was maybe 10 seconds, when i first realized this was not a plane.  the motion was fast and likely could not be replicated by commercial craft of anything i know of in the military.  then, the objects started to move north.  one object left the formation and i think it headed south, while the other two objects proceeded north.  when they moved north there was greater separation.  
5. this is the same light i saw last 4th of july, roughly in the same place, and it was no firework as your investigator dismissed.  i felt like being observed.  i felt odd.   my partner felt amazed and astonished, scared.  i also felt scared, like this has happened to me before.
6.  the objects moved north, rather rapidly.  faster than other commercial aircraft we routinely see from our neighborhood or porch.  the glide path for eastbound aircraft for philadelphia is just slightly south of our residence.  plane are noticeable, especially with landing lights, but you can usually see required faa marker lights (port, starboard and aft lighting, in addition to landing lights).   what we witnessed were objects, not a plane and certainly appeared to be on fire.  
objects moved north, northwest.  out of the line of sight.

pictures available, if and only if you want to see.  i work for the government, and based on the dismissive nature i received from your investigator last year, i am not impressed with his abilities to actually be objective and investigate.
content.summary: Red fire balls

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the drive strips with my brother on may 14 we got out there around 9:30 pm we set binoculars up and had my night vision goggles and camera we were of coarse looking up it was clear sky's and the wind was blowing and i seen a bright white light i was brighter than a satalight but i thought that what it was then watched it it was going north to south it was high up and then the light dimmed and then it stopped and wobbled back and forth and then keep going in a strait line but stopping and wobbling 4 more times and the light pulsated and was going out a few seconds latter the light came back on and kept going south over my neighborhood then like a minute latter we saw another in a strait line right behind the first one and it pulsated then a few minutes latter we saw 2 more bright lights one was fallowing the front one but from where i was it looked a foot apart but who know how far in the sky and the weren't in the same line as the first two but close and same direction and those lights were brighter than the brightest star i know when you see a satilight it is dim and don't pulsate and stop and see that many in a short amount of time the last 2 wee seen were bright then was going south and blinked out then at 10:35 we saw the last one but it wasn't as bright and was going east to west over our neighborhood it was lit up for a few minutes and went out i know airplanes helicopters jet liners and military crafts look and sound light what i saw was to high for those to fly im not crazy i take meds for my arthritis but my brother saw them too many people say im crazy and its all in my mind its not im telling the truth im just tired of people saying im crazy and its all my imagination or in saying it for attention every time i see them i run and get my mother and brother so there is more me and what i say i didn't get my mother this time my brother was with me so he saw sorry my spelling is bad i don't care im sitting here in bad pain from my bad arthritis fighting to type this and i took pics but they look like stars you cant tell them apart from stars
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: My brother and i was out sky watching to see if we see any type of ufo and we were going to go in and we saw a bright white light high in the sky i thought it was a satalight

content.detailedDescription: Laying on back deck with fiance looking at stars and saw a bright orange ball over neighbor's house. about 50 yards from us. jumped up in shock to get better view. it was extremely close to us. almost felt like it was watching us. moved in an easterly  directional and gained height at a fast rated of speed. blinked repeatedly and eventually disappeared. observed for approx. 1 minute.
content.summary: Laying on deck looking at stars with fiance. looked too the east and directly over my neighbors house saw a big bright orange ball. jumped up to get a better look and it moved up and away from us to the east. observers got approx. 1 minute. no sound..

content.detailedDescription: Laying on back deck with fiance looking at stars and saw a bright orange ball over neighbor's house. about 50 yards from us. jumped up in shock to get better view. it was extremely close to us. almost felt like it was watching us. moved in an easterly  directional and gained height at a fast rated of speed. blinked repeatedly and eventually disappeared. observed for approx. 1 minute.
content.summary: Laying on deck looking at stars with fiance. looked too the east and directly over my neighbors house saw a big bright orange ball. jumped up to get a better look and it moved up and away from us to the east. observers got approx. 1 minute. no sound..

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice day to throw a party for my young nephew. here we were, outside, nighttime, and having a great time with the family out in the backyard. when suddenly, i hear one of my family members call my name to show me a mysterious object in the sky. soon after, most of my family members gathered into a small crowd and stared at the object. we were all freaking out. questioning this odd and weird object. all of a sudden, while we kept watching, it started to hover around. it was moving upward and a bit downward. this went on for at least three or so minutes. it was blue, green and red. the lights kept changing, blinking, flickering, and i can't even explain it now. we had never seen anything like this. this was not a plane. it was unlike anything i've ever seen before. even my brother-in-law who is easy to explain things and distinguish whether it was a plane or something else, couldn't find a simple explanation. my whole family was shocked yet intrigued. it then descended and disappeared. my little cousin was scared. i had to comfort her. this is what happened last night. i read a person's ufo sighting on here from zion, illinois. he saw something similar to what i did. i'll never forget it. thanks for reading.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in melrose park, il

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south, spotted glowing object in front of me.  realized it was to low to be aircraft, but as i got closer the object now could be viewed from my drivers side window.  object had red glow and a thin black circle could be seen inside of light.  appeared to not be solid object but almost a "see through" feeling.  object was moving, but at a speed different from a helicopter or aircraft.  i pulled over and took a picture with my phone.  object had moved further away by time i could capture it on camera.  no sound, no trail.  no other objects in sky.  it was still light outside but approaching dark.  i wish i could have viewed object longer.
content.summary: Small glowing red object flying low odd speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my rooftop patio, in the 11 o'clock hour. i came outside to cool off from a very heavy meal (i didn't want to catch the "itis" so early in the night). laying down, the sky was clear and one of the "dipper" constellations was slightly to the north of me.

the first object i noticed, seemed like a very slow moving meteor to me. it moved from south to north, through the "scoop" portion of the "dipper". it gained magnitude as it moved: from faint green, to intense, bright green. faster than a plane. slower than a satellite. much, much slower than any meteor i've seen. very high altitude. i felt like it was just one of those once-in-a-lifetime, beautiful, natural anomalies. it had me supposing that friction could happen, at such a low speed.

i invited my lady outside to come see the lovely night sky.

within 5 minutes the next object, had my full attention. approximately 500 meters to the east, at approximately 300-500 feet altitude. travelling south to north. it appeared as 2 lights within 100 feet of each other, in formation. the left light, slightly ahead of the right. they moved rapidly. much faster than an f-18, a little slower than a satellite. absolute silence. that is when we noticed there was no more air traffic overhead, just circling in the distance. we are on a takeoff/ landing path east of pearson international airport (hereafter: pia). i felt focused and alert, at this point. i felt kind of envious, towards whoever may be piloting (up there, free as a bird, pushing a vehicle i could only dream about). i pondered what type of propulsion it had. my girlfriend could corroborate the visual, however had a different perception.

within 5 minutes, a similar 2 lights flew directly overhead. same 300-500 foot altitude. same south to north trajectory, through the mid point of the "dipper". same silence. a little slower than the previous, yet still very fast. the right light was slightly ahead of the left. as it passed under a small cloud, i could see that the lights were joined by a body. could have been cylinder, could have been a rectangle. i felt inspired by my curiosity, at this point. my lady's observation and perception, were very similar to mine.

within 30 seconds to a minute of that, a 2 engine (under wing) jetliner passed directly overhead. same path as the previous object, however moving north to south. normal jetliner speed. under 1000 feet in altitude. i felt curious as to why that was the only plane in the sky. why did it fly that low? why did it take that trajectory? was that plane special- were the previous sightings a security escort? again i felt envy for the flight crew: they had a better vantage point, therefore understanding of the situation.

at this point, i wanted to see more. i could feel the "show" wasn't over. it was still too quiet. i stood up and took a 360 eyeball.

immediately, i saw a very bright light, to the south west. yellow-orange, slowly pulsating in intensity. far too bright, for jetliner high-beams on direct approach. held position far too long, for a normal direct approach. i asked my girlfriend to keep an eye on it, while i retrieved binoculars.

through a pair of 10 x 50 binocs with a 5 degree field, i could make out that the light was cycling the colours of the spectrum. not a linear cycle, but opposites on the colour wheel (ie: film correction colour wheel). it was hovering. i could not see a body/ frame, just lights. i estimate this light source to have been under 1000 feet in altitude. possibly over south mississauga or the north end of lake ontario. as one of the jetliners in the holding pattern in the distance approached that position: the light source faded, and travelled north. at this point, i had no emotions. i was in strict observation mode. my girlfriend was slightly more emotional, trying to rationalize what she saw.

within 10 minutes, another similar light source appeared. under 1000 feet in altitude. i would estimate the light source was over the west side of mississauga, definitely east of the niagara escarptment (where planes were circling in the distance). stationary position. same colour cycling. same fade as a plane approached. same northern trajectory, on departure. at this point, i assume that norad is cool with what's going on. they know there is a halt to takeoffs/ landings at pia. they have multiple eyes on the situation. i assume flight crews in the distance are making observations (even if not reported).

within another 5 minutes, i see what i assume to be a satellite. travelling south to north, through the "dipper". usual satellite speed & altitude. i felt very confident at this point. we now had known vehicles, to reference what we were observing. i was curious, if it was a "bird" positioned to record this event's data, or not.

within another 5 minutes, another bright cycling light source appeared directly to the west of us. i would place this source directly over midtown mississauga, south of pia. hovering. same light cycle. same intensity. same fade behavior as a plane approached. same departure direction. i asked my girlfriend to use her phone, to document the event. she took several photos and a video. the images look like any other light source in the sky. at least they can corroborate time, colours and position. i felt satisfied at this point, that this event would not involve me, or progress any further. so, i went inside.

within another 5 minutes, my girlfriend reported seeing another similar light source. i was only half interested. at this point, my thoughts were selfish. i'm a stereographer, and i didn't even have a bloggie 3d at my disposal to document it. now i know what my next purchase will be.

overall my end feelings, were as of those in the beginning. last night was just one of those beautiful little curveballs life throws at you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple cylinders observed overhead and to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
...This video was taken on march 12, 2014 wednesday, clear sky,en-route to puerto rico. flight #1938 jet blue, departure time from mco-orlando, fl was 10:15am and arrival 12:59pm. approximately 45 minutes before landing  and i would guess north of mona passage my daughters and i noticed and observed this "ufo". we were not the only one observing this anomaly. i heard others commenting about it. 
but this object was hovering/stationary which was very unusual. upon my arrival i check different net on line to see if any stars or satellite was visible during that period of time. my search revealed nothing. also you can see the top and bottom of it and of course is cylindrical. i cant tell you how big it was since there was not background solid object to compare with.
the object appears to expand and contract. silver/metallic color. 
my feelings was skeptical at first. i thought it was an airplane, but the shape indicate otherwise. my daughter was concern and nervous about it. to calm her concern i told her it was an airplane, however she and i knew better, since we had seen commercial airplane on air before. i lost contact when my daughter closed the window shade. after my arrival, i search online about news of any "ufo" in the north west corner of puerto rico and found some information about sightings in that area.
content.summary: Ufo over north west atlantic puerto rico

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on i 95 with son when we noticed this object with a smaller white object and a more faint black object above it. at first glance thought it was a plane pulling a sign but realized real quick it wasnt moving and there was no sign and really it just didnt look like it. we noticed a ton of divers in other cars pointing and taking pictures
content.summary: Noticed it hovering and noticed other drivers pointing as well

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony trying to see the meteor shower, the weather station said that night should be a good one for viewing. i didn't stay out long but sat on a chair on my balcony from about 10:30 pm to 11:30 pm. i didn't see any meteors but saw this fluttering brown colored object and thought at first how strange it looked and said out loud to myself, wow, that's strange. then i thought it must be a balloon but it did not act like any that i ever saw before. it was coming from the east and i kept watching it until it flew out of sight, over our condominium toward the west. it was going at a steady fast speed, i would guess around the same height that airplanes would fly, only faster than a plane. the shape seemed to change slightly and at times seemed to be fluttering like a large bird and then it seemed to have this floppy sting ray shape. i wish that i could have seen it for a longer time. also, the color was strange to me, even though it was a copper brown color, i could still make it out against the dark starry sky. it almost seemed to have a slight glow within it. it made me feel very excited as i was watching it and the next day i immediately told my daughter about it.
content.summary: I was on my balcony to try and see the meteor shower, i didn't see any meteors but saw this fluttering brown color object, thought it was a balloon, but did not act like one, it was going at a steady speed, at the same time seem to have a fluttery shape

content.detailedDescription:
We watched this fireball from boca raton fl. large orange ball with what looked like three flames in a triangle shape traveling very straight on a north west direction around 10:50 pm on may 24, 2014. we also happened to have a blackout that evening here in boca raton fl making the object very bright in the sky, when we woke this morning we were sure this would be all over the news as we live here in south florida and have witnessed many nasa launches but none ever looked like this.

did anyone else seen this?
content.summary: Large fireball shooting across south fl

content.detailedDescription:
At around 21:45 pm on 13th june 2013 i was taking random pictures with my phone-camera from my open apartment window of the sunset over the town of peel, isle of man. i took 3 pictures and some days later i uploaded them to the pc. it was only then that i noticed the object to the left-centre of the frame 2/3rds up. i quickly realized that this object was the shape of a 'classic' ufo.  the setting sun appeared to be reflecting off the underside.
the window was open and there was no dirt etc. on the camera lens.
content.summary: Photo taken of sunset. later revealed ufo which was not noticed at the time of photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home tonight at about 9:15 central time. i saw what appeared to be a round ball of fire hovering in the sky above the louis joliet mall here in joliet, il.I was about a block away from the mall. at first, i thought it might be a helicopter, but i've never seen one with a light that large or that color.It was glowing and red or red-orange in color with some yellow streaks in it. it literally looked like someone picked up a flame and somehow enclosed it in a globe. it looked like it was at about the height that a helicopter would fly but did not appear to be moving. the mall parking lot has large lights on tall poles and this was much larger than the lights and seemed to be almost perfectly round.

i pulled off into my subdivision which has a lot of trees and drove slowly down the street and could see it on and off between the trees and seemed to be in a stationary position. i stopped once to look at it. it didn't move and i rolled down the windows to listen for sounds of a airplane or helicopter. i heard nothing. i drove further up the street and lost it momentarily because of a large group of trees and then stopped at a large clearing and had an open view of the sky to the north. nothing was in sight. i drove a block back to the south to a school parking lot so i could see in all directions and nothing was in sight. the thing had completely disappeared in a matter of about 20 seconds.
i then drove to the mall parking lot to get another open view of the sky but it was gone.

i really couldn't believe what i was seeing and kept staring at it and trying to talk myself out of the possibility that it was a ufo. after i was convinced that it had disappeared and wasn't going to show up again, i texted my grandson. then i called my daughter and son-in-law and described it to them. i then texted my son because i wasn't sure he was still awake. he called me almost immediately to get the details.

i've never seen anything like this and have never heard of any ufo sightings that fit this description but i'm convinced that this was not any kind of an airplane or helicopter. 

i'm a retired educator and i think i'm pretty observant. this is the second time i've seen a possible ufo but the first time was a very quick event and it was gone almost immediately. it was in minnesota and 4 of us witnessed it. this event was spectacular. i don't know how frequently such sightings occur near joliet. i would think that others in the area may have seen it as well.
content.summary: Orange to orange-red with some yellow, spherical flame.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in gordons well on vacation with me family it was our last night there and we had just finished packing up and we're all hanging out around the camp fire at around 11-1130ish. i was star gazing as i normally do while sitting at the fire when i noticed a large smoke ring like object in the sky. at first i thought it was smoke from the fire until i saw that it was a perfect circle and was about 100 yards or so across, i pointed it out to my brother and step mother and they saw it to. so we grab one of spot lights we had been using to see while loading and we put the spot light on the craft and in a blink of an eye it was gone and had moved about 200-300 yards away still hovering at the same altitude. once we started lighting about 6 other camps in the area all noticed it as well and did the same thing for the next 2 minutes the craft kept zipping around going from stopped to being 500 yards away in less than a second before it disappeared for good. as someone who didn't and believe in ufo this kind of shocked me at the time i remember feeling kind shocked but super curious at the same time, why was the craft floating over open desert like that the six camps were the only life for about 45 miles before you hit the main road. also how did it move so quick nothing man made moves like that we have some amazing technology but that was crazy, and the stealth technology was great had i not been looking hard for star clusters i would have missed it for sure. i am really just curious to see if anyone on this site was there or had a similar experience out in this part of the desert and could she'd some light on what i saw, it's been years since it happened but for some reason i just thought about it again and wanted to look into it.
content.summary: Large smoke ring like ufo appeared to be invisible except for edges
